label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 1
rdfs_comment: The recommended controlled vocabulary for dcterms:type was changed from a vocabulary of Darwin Core Classes (Occurrence, Taxon, Location, Event) to the DCMI type vocabulary (PhysicalObject, Event, StillImage, MovingImage, Sound, Text, Dataset) to be consistent with the standard use of that term.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 2
rdfs_comment: The recommended controlled vocabulary for basisOfRecord remains the Darwin Core Type Vocabulary, but the Dublin Core classes StillImage, MovingImage, and Sound were removed from that list as these are to be used as vocabulary for the dcterms:type term.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 3
rdfs_comment: The Dublin Core type vocabulary values StillImage, MovingImage, and Sound have not been added to the list of valid values for Darwin Core type vocabulary pending further insights from the RDF Interest Group about how best to manage basisOfRecord when a record can be "about" more than one subject.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 4
rdfs_comment: The recommendation to add alias as an attribute of Darwin Core terms was rejected as being an application-specific recommendation without sufficiently demonstrated community need.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 5
rdfs_comment: The label for all terms have been changed to words in English rather than lower camel case term names. This will facilitate discovery with search engines and is consistent with Dublin Core.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 6
rdfs_comment: The subclasses for Darwin Core type vocabulary have been removed. These were seen as too constraining when considering biodiversity information in the context of linked data.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 7
rdfs_comment: The term Darwin Core term dwc:occurrenceDetails has been deprecated in favor of a new record-level term from the Dublin Core - dcterms:references, which is broader in meaning than the deprecated term.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 8
rdfs_comment: Added term namePublishedInYear.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 9
rdfs_comment: Added term georeferencedDate.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 10
rdfs_comment: Added term identificationVerificationStatus.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 11
rdfs_comment: Added term MaterialSample.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 12
rdfs_comment: Added Darwin Core type vocabulary term MaterialSample.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 13
rdfs_comment: Added term materialSampleID.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 14
rdfs_comment: Added class term Organism with associated properties organismID, organismName, organismScope, organismRemarks, and associatedOrganisms. Associated terms previousIdentifications and associatedOccurrences with the new Organism class. Removed the individualID term.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 15
rdfs_comment: Deprecated the Darwin Core Type Vocabulary (http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/dwctype) in favor of the corresponding terms in the dwc namespace (http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms). Added terms PreservedSpecimen, LivingSpecimen, FossilSpecimen, MachineObservation, and HumanObservation to the Darwin Core namespace (http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms).

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 16
rdfs_comment: Added comments recommending list value separation with ' | ' for terms that can be constructed from concatenated lists. Added comment recommending that dynamicProperties be populated with JSON.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 17
rdfs_comment: Deprecated the Dublin Core rights term in favor of the Dublin Core license term, which is how rights was being promoted since it was first recommended for use in Darwin Core.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 18
rdfs_comment: Added the following terms related to sampling events: parentEventID, sampleSizeValue, sampleSizeUnit, organismQuantity, organismQuantityType.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 19
rdfs_comment: Remove the layer property from all terms in Audubon Core. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/143

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 20
rdfs_comment: Revised the usage guidelines for dc:type and dcterms:type in Audubon Core. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/144

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 21
rdfs_comment: Added the service access point class ac:ServiceAccessPoint to Audubon Core. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/137

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 22
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Darwin Core pathway term. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/259

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 23
rdfs_comment: Added new Darwin Core terms dwc:pathway and dwciri:pathway. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/236

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 24
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Darwin Core establishmentMeans term. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/258

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 25
rdfs_comment: Changed definition of dwc:establishmentMeans and dwciri:establishmentMeans and metadata pointing to newly established controlled vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/235

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 26
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Darwin Core degreeOfEstablishment term. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/257

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 27
rdfs_comment: Added new Darwin Core terms dwc:degreeOfEstablishment and dwciri:degreeOfEstablishment. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/237

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 28
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Audubon Core subtype and subtypeLiteral terms and modified the metadata of those terms to make them compatible with the new controlled vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/175

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 29
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Dublin Core format terms and modified the Audubon Core usage guidelines for those terms in light of the new controlled vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/171

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 30
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabulary for the Audubon Core variant and variantLiteral terms and modified the metadata of those terms to make them compatible with the new controlled vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/170

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 31
rdfs_comment: Imported the term mo:sample_rate into the Audubon Core vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/177

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 32
rdfs_comment: Added new Audubon Core terms ac:freqLow and ac:freqHigh. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/178

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 33
rdfs_comment: Created the Chronometric Age extension for Darwin Core. See http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/doc/chrono/

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 34
rdfs_comment: Darwin Core additions and changes. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/14

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 35
rdfs_comment: Additions and changes to Audubon Core associated with Regions of Interest (ROI). See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/milestone/4

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 36
rdfs_comment: Implement model reference links in Audubon Core subtype controlled vocabulary. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/220

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 37
rdfs_comment: Revise ac:subjectOrientation and ac:subjectPart and add ac:subjectOrientationLiteral and ac:subjectPartLiteral. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/195

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 38
rdfs_comment: Recategorize ac:framerate. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/217

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 39
rdfs_comment: Created the controlled vocabularies for Audiovisual Core subjectPart and subjectOrientation. See https://github.com/tdwg/ac/issues/245

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 40
rdfs_comment: Darwin Core additions and changes. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/16

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 41
rdfs_comment: Darwin Core changes related to the new MaterialSample class. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/18

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 42
rdfs_comment: Humboldt Extension for Ecological Inventories and controlled vocabulary for eco:taxonCompletenessReported ratified as a part of the Darwin Core Standard. See https://github.com/tdwg/hc/milestone/1

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 43
rdfs_comment: Latimer Core ratified as a new TDWG standard.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 44
rdfs_comment: Darwin Core changes ratified as a part of the Darwin Core public review. https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/19.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 45
rdfs_comment: Chronometric Age Extension changes ratified as a part of the Darwin Core public review. https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/19.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 46
rdfs_comment: Humboldt Extension for Ecological Inventories changes ratified as a part of the Darwin Core public review. https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/milestone/19.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 47
rdfs_comment: Establiment Means Controlled Vocabulary ratified as a part of the Darwin Core Standard. See https://github.com/tdwg/hc/milestone/19.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 48
rdfs_comment: Pathway Controlled Vocabulary ratified as a part of the Darwin Core Standard. See https://github.com/tdwg/hc/milestone/19.

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 49
rdfs_comment: Namespace errata in Chronometric Age Extension corrected by Darwin Core Maintenance Group. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/559

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 50
rdfs_comment: Namespace errata in Darwin Core main vocabulary corrected by Darwin Core Maintenance Group. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/559

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 51
rdfs_comment: Namespace errata in Humboldt Extension corrected by Darwin Core Maintenance Group. See https://github.com/tdwg/dwc/issues/559

label: TDWG Executive Committee decision 52
rdfs_comment: Audiovisual Core term updates for CVterm, Digital3DResource, and audio filters
